channel.title: Need urgent help! please!
channel.description:
When ever I make my client into a .jar file (for web client) I get this error in the cmd....
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.util.regex.Pattern$BnM.optimize(Pattern.java:5308) at java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(Pattern.java:1678) at java.util.regex.Pattern.(Pattern.java:1337) at java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(Pattern.java:1022) at java.lang.String.replaceAll(String.java:2210) at RSInterface.unpack(RSInterface.java:124) at client.startUp(client.java:8654) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5755) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
Please help me solve this! Thanks!

item.title: Need urgent help! please!
